#summary Coherence Security




|| Name || Description || Example ||
|| IdentityTransformer || Transforms the Subject -> Token (may be null) || Kerberos ||
|| IdentityAsserter || Transforms the Token -> Subject (may be null) || Kerberos ||
|| CacheServiceProxy || Intercepts cache requests || Use Gridmans! ||
|| InvokeServiceProxy || Intercepts invoke requests || Use Gridmans! ||

Gridman provides the following :

|| CacheSecurityProvider || Subject, CacheName, Readonly || Use a cache or AD Groups ||
|| InvokeSecurityProvider || Subject, Invocable || Use a cache or AD Groups ||
 

  All of these hooks can be used for audit as well as security
